name: LinguaMatch
description: LinguaMatch, the fun and educational game that helps you learn Russian and English vocabulary! In this game, you'll be presented with pairs of words in both languages, and your goal is to match words that have the same meaning.   Playing LinguaMatch is easy and intuitive. To get started, simply select a level, and the game will present you with a grid of words. Your task is to find matching pairs by clicking on them. When you find a match, the game will highlight the pair, and you'll earn points. The faster you find the matches, the more points you'll earn.
